front.title: Extension Formats for Unidirectional Link Encapsulation (ULE) and the Generic Stream Encapsulation (GSE)

abstract.t: This document describes a set of Extension Headers for the Unidirectional Link Encapsulation (ULE) [RFC4236]. The Extension Header formats defined in this document define new extensions that are common extensions to both ULE and the Generic Stream Encapsulation (GSE) [GSE] defined by the second generation framing structure DVB-S2 standard [S2].
